short_name: ONI AI Protocol | Open Network Integration - The Key to Open Network Synergy
name: ONI AI Protocol | Open Network Integration - The Key to Open Network Synergy
description: ONI AI Protocol is a platform developed to solve the problem of open network integration and cross-chain connectivity. With the development of DePIN and AI of ONI AI Protocol - users are empowered to share profits from Nodes/GPUs and become Validators. ONI AI Protocol provides a seamless and tight connection between resource providers and developers. Discover now the next generation of decentralization and bring blockchain technology closer to global coverage.
